alert.note: Alert for Okmulgee (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 04 at 7:49PM CDT until further notice by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Oklahoma... Deep Fork River near Beggs affecting Okmulgee County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Deep Fork River near Beggs. * WHEN...From this evening until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 24.0 feet, some county roads south of Beggs and northwest of Okmulgee are flooded. Dentonville Road southwest of Beggs may be impassable. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:15 PM CDT Wednesday the stage was 17.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this evening and continue rising to a crest of 23.5 feet early Saturday afternoon. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
